summary: After a robbery scam that goes bad, lovers Nikki and Al take off into the Australian outback, pursued by the police and a malevolent footballer named Zipper Doyle, and meet a number of offbeat characters.

keywords: murdered in a car accident|lying on a bed|man in a bed|woman in a bed|woman wears eyeglasses
title: Kiss or Kill
